{
  /*
   * A sample Renovate configuration file with various comments
   * to test preservation of comments during migration.
   *
   * This explanation itself is part of the test.
   */
  "extends": [
    ":separateMajorReleases",
    ":prImmediately",
    ":renovatePrefix",
    ":semanticPrefixFixDepsChoreOthers",
    ":updateNotScheduled",  // this comment should be kept
    ":automergeDisabled",
    ":maintainLockFilesDisabled",
    // this one too
    "group:monorepos"
  ],
  "onboarding": false,
  "rangeStrategy": "replace",
  "semanticCommits": "enabled", // but this one stays
  "timezone": "US/Central",
  // this should be preserved too
  "baseBranches": [
    "main"
  ]
}
